a.create_time AS create_time, a.update_time AS update_time, u.nickname AS author_nickname, u.website AS author_website, u.avatar AS author_avatar, tag_name FROM (SELECT id, user_id, memory_cover, memory_title, memory_abstract, memory_content, is_delete, create_time, update_time FROM t_memory where user_id = #{userId}) a LEFT JOIN t_memory_tag at ON a.id = at.memory_id LEFT JOIN t_tag t ON t.id = at.tag_id LEFT JOIN t_user_info u ON a.user_id = u.id where a.is_delete = 0
